answers.answer: intestinal infection irratable bowel syndrome or maybe colitis
ill advice you go and see a doctor it might be an infection

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Other than IBS or spastic colon you could be suffering from Celiac Disease/Ulcerative Colitis/ Crohn’s disease, H pylori infection, diabetes, food intolerance, malabsorption syndromes, constipation, gallbladder and liver problems, pancreatic dysfunction, or taking a diet rich in sulfites. Cancers of the gut and in female ovarian cancer  and PCOD too could be a cause—not meant to scare you but if all other causes are ruled out, then this can be a possibility. It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Do consult your doctor. Take care!
